text:
is suff ering from any of the following:
/circle6 High blood pressure (hypertension)
/circle6 Diabetes
/circle6 Breathlessness on exertion, palpitations (heart disease)
/circle6 Chronic cough, blood in the sputum, prolonged fever (tuberculosis)
/circle6 Renal disease
/circle6 Convulsions (epilepsy)
/circle6 Attacks of breathlessness or asthma
/circle6 Jaundice 
/circle6 Malaria
/circle6 Other illnesses, e.g. Reproductive Tract Infection (RTI), Sexually Transmitted Infection 
(STI) and HIV/AIDS.
